comment._content: I started an entry for him in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andreas_Petrus_Lundin [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5051561702/]

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Einar Sivard and his bride, Signe Holm Sivard, who intended to cross the Atlantic in the Lundin Power Life Boat, and left New York harbor on July 25, 1914, but were turned back at Boston when news reached them that war had broken out in Europe:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5764554979/in/photostream/]
The test run from New York harbor to Boston:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/6035107573/]
